name: Delay the Inevitable (eboatwright)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50!

I was busy this weekend, and didn't have much time to work on it, but I did the best I could, and I hope you guys like it!

You are sent on a mission to delay a spaceship hurling towards Earth, called The Inevitable. Even if you perish, your efforts will not be in vain.

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD for movement,

Space or Z to shoot or advance menus.

Credits:

Music made by Gruber

Everything else by me :)

I used Rust, Macroquad, and SFXR for this project
